synopsis:
Shueisha's online manga magazine Grand Jump Web announced on Wednesday that Torajirou Kishi's seinen manga Otome no Teikoku will get a "petit" anime adaptation. The advertisement says the characters will "move for about six seconds."

Etsuko Sumimoto (Yuri Kuma Arashi character design, Puella Magi Madoka Magica The Movie Part 3: Rebellion animation director) is drawing the animation. Kishi will participate by handling the coloring, and Shigeki Kimoto (Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? character design) is providing support illustration.
